casebody.data:
Hannah Marie Johnson KEARNEY
v.
Bruce R. BOLLING, MD. No. 321P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 17, 2016. Harvey L. Kennedy, Winston-Salem, for Kearney, Hannah Marie Johnson. Harold L. Kennedy, III, Winston-Salem. Scott M. Stevenson, Charlotte, for Bolling, Bruce R. (M.D.). Lisa M. Hoffman, Charlotte.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 17th of September 2015 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of March 2016."
